bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of Utility Scam Awareness Day.
Encourages the United States to observe Utility Scam Awareness Day on the third Wednesday of November.
Encourages utilities to use this day to raise awareness and knowledge amongst themselves and the general public regarding the threat posed by scams against utility customers, and the techniques and tools used to identify and avoid them.
